name: Amandio C - Paperflame

wavecode_0_a=1.000000
wave_0_per_point1=curves=6+3* cos(.2*time);
wave_0_per_point2=wave=sample*curves;
wave_0_per_point3=x=.5+.4* sin(wave) * cos(.2*time);
wave_0_per_point4=y=.5+.15*( cos(wave+time) +sqrt(sample));

wavecode_2_g=1.000000

wavecode_2_a=0.730000
wave_2_per_frame1=r=.7+.2*sin(.1*time);
wave_2_per_frame2=g=.4+.3*sin(.2*time);
wave_2_per_frame3=b=.5+.4*sin(.15*time);
wave_2_per_point1=curves=6+3* cos(.2*time);
wave_2_per_point2=wave=sample*curves;
wave_2_per_point3=x=.5+.4* sin(wave) * cos(.2*time);
wave_2_per_point4=y=.5+.15*( cos(wave+time) +sqrt(sample));

shapecode_1_rad=0.100000
shapecode_1_ang=0.000000

shapecode_1_g=0.000000
shapecode_1_b=0.000000
shapecode_1_a=1.000000

shapecode_1_g2=1.000000

shapecode_1_a2=0.000000
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.100000

shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0

shapecode_2_y=0.500000
shapecode_2_rad=0.100000

shapecode_2_g=0.000000
shapecode_2_b=0.000000

shapecode_2_g2=1.000000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100000
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_x=0.500000
shapecode_3_y=0.500000
shapecode_3_rad=0.100000
shapecode_3_ang=0.000000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.000000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.000000
shapecode_3_r=1.000000
shapecode_3_g=0.000000
shapecode_3_b=0.000000
shapecode_3_a=1.000000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100000
per_frame_1=angle =3.14+.2*sin(.3*time);
per_frame_2=q31 = sin(angle);
per_frame_3=q32 = cos(angle);
per_frame_4=q5=0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=sx=.998;
per_frame_7=sy=.998;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    
warp_6=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_7=`    ret -=.004; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_8=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`/////////// "Rototranslate" code by Stahlregen/////////////
comp_3=`
comp_4=`
comp_5=`shader_body
comp_6=`{
comp_7=`
comp_8=`//As a base, sample the main sampler at normal uv coordinates and store as return value:
comp_9=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_10=`
comp_11=`//Define the translation in (x,y)-direction and multiply by texsize.zw to convert the length to pixels:
comp_12=`float2 shift = float2(q5,q5)*texsize.zw; 
comp_13=`
comp_14=`//Take the original uv coordinates as a starting point, store in second set of coordinates:
comp_15=`float2 uv2 = uv;
comp_16=`
comp_17=`//Start iterations...
comp_18=`int n = 1;
comp_19=`while (n<=3) {
comp_20=`
comp_21=`//First step: put origin in center;
comp_22=`uv2 = uv2-.5;
comp_23=`
comp_24=`//Next, rotate by a factor we set in the per-frame equations - q32 is cos(angle) and q31 is sin(angle): 
comp_25=`uv2 = float2((uv2.x)*q32 - (uv2.y) * q31,(uv2.x)* q31 + (uv2.y) * q32)+.5;
comp_26=`
comp_27=`//Then, shift uv coordinates n times - see the step after the next as to why:
comp_28=`uv2 += n*shift;
comp_29=`
comp_30=`//Sample the main sampler at our new uv2 coordinates, 
comp_31=`//deduct the result from the current return value, 
comp_32=`//store in ret as absolute (difference) value:
comp_33=`ret = max(ret,GetPixel(uv2));
comp_34=`
comp_35=`//Remove the shift so we won't rotate it with our coordinates in the next iteration:
comp_36=`uv2 -= n*shift;
comp_37=`
comp_38=`//Iteration +1
comp_39=`n++;
comp_40=`}
comp_41=`
comp_42=`}
